creator: antoine@apache.org
stevel@apache.org
text:
ANTLRException is in antlr-2.7.6rc1.jar, which is the version which ships with
hibernate 3.1.2

make sure the right right version of antlr is on the classpath. IF there is a
copy in ANT_HOME/lib, update it.
